enum.name: ExtensionCase
enum.description: An enumeration representing different cases for file extensions.

value.name: Max
value.description: Maximum value for the ExtensionCase enum.

function.description: Retrieves a string representation of the given extension case.
function.param: The extension case to get the string representation for.
function.returns: The extension case as a string.

function.description: Finds the extension case corresponding to the given string representation.
function.param: The string representation of the extension case to find.
function.returns: The ExtensionCase enum value corresponding to the provided string representation, or ExtensionCase::Unknown if not found.
